Posts.Content: i had chemo and bone marrow transplant in dec 2000. 14 yrs l8ter my hair hasnt come back...i mean theres some thin fine hairs but its so sparse u can see my entire scalp. good news for folks with eye brow and eye lash regrowth problems...latisse or bimatoprost. it will re grow and make thinker lashes and eye brow hair iv heard they r in clinical trials for scalp hair but no news as of over a yr ago on that. hope this helps some folks as iv found nothing for my head hair i just have 2 use wigs the rest of my life which is such a huge hassle and downer...but if ur on this thread u already know...good luck 2 all.Â
Posts.Title: 2 years after chemo, my hair has not grown back
